SEARCH
Package game.items.weapons

Class GiantHammer

java.lang.Object
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.GameEntity
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.items.Item
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.weapons.WeaponItem
game.items.weapons.GiantHammer
All Implemented Interfaces:
Printable, Weapon, Sellable
public class GiantHammer extends WeaponItem implements Sellable
A class representing a Giant Hammer weapon item in the game. The Giant Hammer is a powerful melee weapon that can be used to attack and deal high damage to enemies. It can also be sold by actors who possess the capability to trade.
Author:
Willson Louisse HV Modified by: Enrico Tanvy

    • GiantHammer

      public GiantHammer()
      Constructor for the GiantHammer class. Initializes the Giant Hammer with a name, display character, damage points, verb for attack, and hit rate.

  • Method Details

    • sell

      public String sell(Actor actor)
      Sells the Giant Hammer to an actor, adding its selling price to the actor's balance and removing it from their inventory.
      Specified by:
      sell in interface Sellable
      Parameters:
      actor - The actor selling the Giant Hammer.
      Returns:
      A message indicating that the Giant Hammer has been sold.

    • allowableActions

      public ActionList allowableActions(Actor target, Location location)
      Returns a list of allowable actions that the Giant Hammer allows its owner to perform on other actors. These actions may include attacking, performing area-of-effect attacks, and selling the Giant Hammer.
      Overrides:
      allowableActions in class Item
      Parameters:
      target - The target actor on which the actions can be performed.
      location - The location of the target actor.
      Returns:
      An ActionList containing the allowable actions for the Giant Hammer.
